name: Graffiti Dream
description:
My submission for the Rising Star Environment art competition.

It's the first competition I've done, and I'm happy about how it went.

The scene is a representation of a bored high-schooler's imagination during a lesson, creating a metro dream world full of graffiti. 

It has been a pleasure and a roller coaster to work on, and I hope I'll be able to enter other similar competitions soon to refine my skills.
